text: Benjamín Félix Hernández Ruiz is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. In 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Oaxaca. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:People from Oaxaca Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Benjamín Félix Hernández Ruiz
